verse_no:
आत्मा वा इदमेक एवाग्र आसीन्नान्यत्किञ्चन मिषत्‌। 
स ईक्षत लोकान्नु सृजा इति ॥
meaning: Meaning:Indeed, this Self alone existed prior, not anything else desired. He sees the worlds and becomes the creator.Explanation:This verse from the Brahma Sutras is discussing the concept of the Supreme Self, who is the ultimate reality and the cause of creation. It states that before creation, only the Self existed, desiring to manifest and become the creator of the worlds. The verse highlights that the Self is the sole cause of creation and everything else in existence.
